title: @Riot Is just having Elophant client risking getting banned?
body: I really only want it to view my skins. Is there anything in the Elophant client that will get me banned?

replies.body: Using a third party program is at your own [risk](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/5kx4F7VE-reminder-third-party-applications) but I haven't heard of anyone being banned for just using Elophant.
Oh I completely understand Riot can't officially endorse a third party program, but if I use it just to view my skins I dont want  to be at risk of getting banned for it

If the program has the ability to give you a competitive advantage, it will potentially be a threat to your account. Since we don't develop these programs, it's impossible for us to keep tabs on every change or update to them so we cannot greenlight specific apps. I'd reach out to the developer of Elophant if you have questions on what exactly it can do. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
